title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 380: Featuring Jeremy Roenick + Jordan Martinook
description:
On Episode 380 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Jordan Martinook & Jeremy Roenick. Marty joined (1:16:40) to talk about the Canes season, Rod the Bod, who the biggest snap show in the locker room is and tons more. But first, the guys open the show discussing all the recent NHL news, including the Trevor Zegras/Jay Beagle/Troy Terry incident and Keith Yandle’s ironman streak ending. The boys also talk with Murls about his rejuvenated hockey career in Sweden. The guys are then joined by JR, who joined the show (2:18:00) to talk about what he’s been up to since he last came on, rattlesnakes, some golf and more. The guys wrap up the show talking Bruce Willis’s best movies & if Murls will get another contract for the Big Deal Selects.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
